name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save Gmail Emails as PDFs (secured by Duffel)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download your Gmail emails and messages as PDFs in one-click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
---

Here is what you can do with Duffel:
- ‚ö°Ô∏è Download emails in seconds (and in one-click)
- üíØ Download up to 100 emails at once (in a ZIP file)
- üîí Safe and secure (GDPR compliant)
- üòå No signup required! Just install, and start using it!

For those of us who use Gmail, it can be important to download your emails. Duffel is the perfect tool for lawyers, accountants, managers, travel agents, and anyone else who needs to store a backup of their emails offline.

It will download a PDF of an email, or a group of PDFs in a ZIP file, with just one-click.
